metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24532 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The ScalarMult and ScalarBaseMult methods of the P256 Curve may return anincorrect result if called with some specific unreduced scalars (a scalarlarger than the order of the curve). This does not impact usages ofcrypto/ecdsa or crypto/ecdh.

criterions.comment: golang-1.8 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.9 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.10 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.

golang-1.18 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
